item.title: Create repositories
item.description: How to create collection repositories Collections in Open Terms Archive rely on three Git repositories to hold the data: Declarations repository: stores the declarations that define terms to track Snapshots repository: stores raw snapshots of tracked documents Versions repository: stores processed versions of tracked documents This guide assumes you use GitHub. For other Git platforms, adapt these steps accordingly.
